Description: Lower leg section of a steatite shabti of Pediamenope affixed to the foot section to form a single object: inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in one partially surviving and three surviving rows of inscribed Hieroglyphs, the foot is represented as resting on a short plinth.
Condition: fragment - foot and lower leg section only
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
